{{infobox character | people=[[Men|Man]] | name=Artaxerxes | image=Alan Lee - Artaxerxes.jpg | caption="Artaxerxes" by [[Alan Lee]] | pronun= | othernames=Ertaxarxes, Mr. A. Pam | titles=Old | position=Wizard
Pacific and Atlantic Magician | location=[[wikipedia:Pershore|Pershore]]
Deep Blue Sea | affiliation= | language= | birth= | birthlocation=[[wikipedia:Persia|Persia]] | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Mrs. Artaxerxes]] | children= | gender= | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing=Ragged old coat; ragged green trousers and green socks; old pipe; old green hat with a blue feather at the back | weapons=Little wand (Fountain-pen) | steed= }} '''Artaxerxes''' is the wizard, and main antagonist, in ''[[Roverandom]]''. Artaxerxes is described as an old man in ragged trousers wearing a green hat with a blue feather.{{HM|R}}{{rp|1}} == History == Originally from [[wikipedia:Persia|Persia]], Artaxerxes ended up in [[wikipedia:Pershore|Pershore]] by mistake.{{rp|14}} After Artaxerxes picks up [[Rover]]'s yellow ball, Rover demands it back without saying "please". Rover bites Artaxerxes trousers when he continues to refuse to return the ball; in retaliation, Artaxerxes turns Rover into a toy dog and transports Rover to a toy shop.{{rp|1–2}} Although Rover visits the [[Man-in-the-Moon]] with the help of [[Mew]], and seeks the help of the sand-sorcerer [[Psamathos Psamathides]], the great whale [[Uin]] takes Roverandom (as he is now known) to ask Artaxerxes to return him to being a normal dog. Artaxerxes is living at the bottom of the Deep Blue Sea and is married to the daughter of the Mer-king and has a white Mer-dog called Rover. As a wizard, he has been appointed Pacific and Atlantic Magician and is known as '''PAM'''. All the woes of the mer-people are blamed on PAM, including the emergence of a Sea-serpent. Because he is so deeply unpopular, Artaxerxes leaves with his wife and Roverandom: he takes Roverandom with him as the dog continues to be polite and show faith in his magical abilities.{{rp|55 ff}} Back on land, Artaxerxes turns Roverandom back into a real dog. Wearing a purple velvet suit, Artaxerxes sets up a chocolate and cigarette shop by the beach (selling [[wikipedia:Rock (confectionery)|Pam's Rock]]), whilst his wife gave swimming lessons.{{rp|83–7}} == Etymology == [[wikipedia:Artaxerxes|Artaxerxes]] is the name of five Kings of Persia. [[Wayne G. Hammond|Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull|Scull]] note that the abbreviation for Pacific and Atlantic Magaician, PAM, is the same nickname that was given to former British Prime Minister [[wikipedia:Henry John Temple, 3rd Viscount Palmerston|Lord Palmerstone]].{{rp|109}} == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| | | | | MER |y| WIFE |MER=[[Mer-king]]
